text: This is a list of non-official U.S. state dances:Official State Dances, NetState.com, accessed April 21, 2006. State State dance Year & Citation Alabama Square Dance 1981 Alaska Yup'ik dance Arkansas Square Dance Arizona Square dance 2017 California West Coast Swing Square dance (official folk dance) Colorado Square Dance Connecticut Square Dance Delaware Maypole Dance Square Dance (Folk Dance) Florida Square Dance (official folk dance) 1986 Georgia Square Dance Hawaii Hula Idaho Square Dance Illinois Square Dance 1990 Kentucky Clogging 2006 Louisiana Square Dance 1999 Maryland Square Dance Massachusetts Square Dance 1990Folk dance of the Commonwealth, General Laws of Massachusetts, Chapter 2, Section 32. Minnesota None (Proposed Square dance) Mississippi Square Dance 1995Official State Dances from NETSTATE Missouri Square Dance Montana Square Dance Nebraska Square Dance New Jersey Square Dance (official folk dance) 1983 New York Lindy Hop North Carolina Clogging (official folk dance) 2005 Carolina Shag (official popular dance) North Dakota Square Dance Ohio Charleston Oklahoma Square Dance Oregon Square Dance Pennsylvania Polka South Carolina The Shag Square dance (State American Folk Dance) 1994 Richardson waltz (State waltz) 2000 South Dakota Square Dance Tennessee Square Dance Texas Texas Two-Step Utah Square Dance 1994Utah State Folk Dance - Square Dance from pioneer.utah.gov "Pioneer - Utah's Online Library" page. title: List of U.S. state dances
